All inter-dimensional travelers such as yourself must acquire visitant status in order to journey within Abyssea.
To be granted this status, you must provide me with ${keyitem-plural: 0[2]}.${prompt}
Having come from a different plane of existence, your existential phase is unaligned to that of Abyssea.
To overcome this problem, ${keyitem-article: 0[2]} is required. It acts as a stabilizing agent that aligns and anchors your essence to Abyssea for prolonged periods of time.${prompt}
Bereft of its effect, your essence will become unraveled within a matter of minutes, after which you will be expelled to your own reality.
Do make a habit of first coming to me upon arrival in Abyssea.${prompt}
A word of warning. As the presence of unaligned entities may have adverse effects on this dimension, only those with visitant status are permitted to venture beyond the searing ward.${prompt}
Those without visitant status will be forcibly returned to the searing ward's vicinity.
This is a preventative measure against the detrimental effects of inter-dimensional “noise.”${prompt}
When requesting visitant status, please indicate the number of ${keyitem-plural: 0[2]} you wish to process.
A greater number will allow you a longer stay.${prompt}
It is also possible to extend your visitant status by bringing me more ${keyitem-plural: 0[2]}.${prompt}
To obtain ${keyitem-plural: 0[2]}, you must seek out Joachim. He is currently a resident of your world, Vana'diel.${prompt}
Lastly, I will explain in detail the myriad effects granted by the visitant status.${prompt}

Many are the reports of positive things occurring while under its auspices, from a general upturn in fortunes to more specific benefits such as accelerated growth and greater ease of cruor harvesting.${prompt}
Naturally, these benefits will not come to the idle.

Atma is most accurately described as the crystalline agglomeration of an Abyssean creature's soul.
Through painstaking research, we infusionists have discovered a way to imbue ordinary people such as yourself with its power.${prompt}
Infusion makes possible the augmentation of individuals, granting them powers particular to the creature from which the atma is sourced.${prompt}
The infusion process requires three objects: an atma, ${keyitem-article: 0[2]}, and cruor.${prompt}
And it won't please you to know that atma is rarer still.${prompt}
For only the most savage creatures, you see, are known to yield atma.
And if you thought that weren't trial enough, only by employing special combat strategies will atma be yours to own.${prompt}
Atma-yielding monsters are known to have vulnerabilities that, if exploited, may result in a swift end to the confrontation.${prompt}
Strike at a foe's weakness, and it will drop different spoils, often more valuable than usual. Among them you may find atma.${prompt}
The vulnerabilities can broadly be divided into three categories: magic attacks, physical-based weapon skills, and magic-based weapon skills.${prompt}
For instance, there are monsters known to be weak against magic-based weapon skills.
Inflicting such damage upon them will impair their movement, and you may consequently be rewarded with atma.${prompt}
All living creatures, however, possess the capacity to adapt, and vulnerabilities have been observed to change.
Be wary if you wish not to discover to your sorrow that a once-foolproof strategy no longer applies.${prompt}
Besting such fell creatures is in itself a harrowing task, and becomes even more so if procuring atma is your objective.${prompt}
But should fortune smile upon you and you find yourself in possession of atma, bring it here.
I will see that it serves you well.${prompt}

Greetings. I am an atma fabricant--or, to the layman, one who fabricates atma.
I can synthesize atma from the memories of adventure stored deep within your body and soul.
If you have need of my services, you need only speak the word.${prompt}
Ask for something?
${selection-lines}

Synthetic atma?
My memories?
Show me the atma.${prompt}
As you are no doubt aware, the substance we call atma is a crystalline agglomeration of soul energy that can be harvested from the bodies of fallen Abyssean fiends.${prompt}
The abundant power that it imbues when infused into our bodies is not in question.
The perilous means by which it must be acquired, however, leaves something to be desired.${prompt}
After all, bolstering the strength of one man means little if ten others must lose their lives in the process.
Thus was the impetus behind our research: to discover a means for extracting atma from resources at our immediate disposal.${prompt}
We experimented with nearly every substance in sight--be it animal, vegetable, or mineral.
Yet each time, the atma produced was small, fragile, and entirely absent of the power we sought.${prompt}
Then, one day, we hit upon the obvious answer that we had so long overlooked...ourselves.
Yes, the atma extracted from our own bodies--particularly those richly possessed of experiences and memories--these housed a power rivalling that harvested from the most vicious of fiends.${prompt}
If you possess such memories, then I can bring forth the latent power that resides within you as well.${prompt}
Fear not, for there is everything to gain and nothing to lose.
Save for some cruor, that is...${prompt}
Curious, is it not?
That potent physical energy can be extracted from such a tenuous, intangible thing...${prompt}
But the strength our memories and experiences give us is real, if all too easily overlooked.
Once isolated, it is simply a matter of recalling it, solidifying it, and bringing it to the fore.${prompt}
Surely you understand of what it is I speak, yes?
Your greatest accomplishments--those that make others stand in wonderment and admiration when you they hear your name.${prompt}
We summon forth the energies from the deepest recesses of your psyche, and infuse it into the cruor you carry.
The resultant agglomeration of organic mineral and soul energy is synthetic atma.${prompt}
Mind you, the deeper and more puissant your energies, the more cruor will be necessary to contain it all.
If you wish to have me assay the powers that lie dormant within you, simply speak the word.${prompt}
Very well. We shall see what latent powers you possess.
Stand still and clear your mind...${prompt}
Yes...it is as I thought...
Long and far have you traveled...many a battle have you fought...${prompt}
Which shall I extract?${prompt}
...And yet, I see nothing tangible enough for me to process.
I am sorry.${prompt}

${color-alt: 121}${name-player} obtains ${number: 0} Resistance ${choice-plurality: 0}[Credit/Credits].${prompt}
Well met, friend. I am the prefect for the resistance effort in this area.
We seek the cooperation of stout-hearted individuals in defending the pulse martello against the Abyssean fiends.${prompt}
What will you do?
${selection-lines}
Nothing.
Ask general questions.
Learn about the current situation.
Receive Pennant.
Return Pennant.
Exchange Resistance Credits.${prompt}
Ask about...
${selection-lines}
Nothing right now.
The enemy's objective.
The pulse martello.
How I can do my part.${prompt}
The pulse martello, the cornerstone of the resistance effort, is stationed here at this outpost.${prompt}
Its operation requires “martello cores,” the type and quantity of which determines the potency of the aid it lends to our activities.${prompt}
The Abyssean hordes, however, somehow learned of the pulse martello's inner workings, and have taken to targeting the outpost.
On more than a few occasions, they have broken through our defenses and made off with cores.${prompt}
We've rallied our forces and retrieved some of the stolen cores, but doing so has been observed to infuriate the enemy.${prompt}
Through the course of our encounters with the fiends, we've attained a better understanding of their behavioral patterns.${prompt}
First of all, a more powerful pulse martello incurs the ire of the creatures, provoking them to come at us in force.${prompt}
Secondly, the greater sway we hold over the area, the more frequently the enemy will attack.${prompt}

The Abyssean hordes are determined not to allow us a foothold in the struggle. Actions that forward our cause in any capacity, such as slaying them in great numbers and bolstering the resistance effort, are surefire ways to gain their attention.${prompt}
Lastly, enemy forces will emerge and surge towards the outpost from one of three locations, each called a “verge.”${prompt}
The timing at which they will next appear from a certain verge is ever-changing, so we must remain on constant alert.${prompt}
Armed with this intel, we're constantly buttressing ourselves against future enemy attacks.${prompt}
Experience has taught us much about when to expect the Abyssean hordes, and in what numbers.
If you wish to know this information, simply ask me.${prompt}
The pulse martello, stationed a short distance from here, was developed to serve as the bastion for area-wide resistance efforts.${prompt}
It sustains our activities in myriad ways, such as amplifying support effects and lessening the burden borne by veridical confluxes.${prompt}
By installing increasingly potent cores, and in greater numbers, we can boost the martello's power output, thus further enhancing its benefits.${prompt}
As you can see, the pulse martello is instrumental in our struggle for survival.${prompt}
Which makes it doubly unfortunate that it isn't more durable; the fiends can break through to steal its cores all too easily.${prompt}
Stolen cores can be retrieved by slaying the enemy.
In so doing, however, we incur their ire, and they will later come back at us with greater strength.${prompt}
A more powerful pulse martello will also draw the enemy's attention.
It is believed that the fiends can sense the energy waves being emitted, even if they do not derive the benefits as we do.${prompt}
As such, any upgrades performed to the purlse martello must be accompanied with the shoring up of our defenses.
The type and number of cores installed are a fairly accurate indicator of what the enemy will throw at us. If you wish to know these details, simply ask me.${prompt}
When the enemy attacks, we can never have too many sword arms to help us defend the outpost.${prompt}
However, that isn't the only area in which we require assistance.
During lulls in the fighting, you can participate in various resistance operations to help us consolidate our defenses.${prompt}
Whichever way you choose to assist us, you will be rewarded in Resistance Credits, the amount of which is determined through an evaluation.${prompt}
Resistance Credits, in particular, can be traded to me in exchange for rare and useful items.${prompt}
Should you wish to help us defend the outpost, speak with me and I will issue you with a Pennant.${prompt}
A Pennant identifies you as having received official clearance to participate in the outpost's defense.
Without it, you will not receive any recompense for your contributions. Be sure to keep this in mind.${prompt}
As the performance evaluation is carried out on a per-enemy basis, it is permissible to return the Pennant at any time.${prompt}
The Pennant will automatically disappear upon the conclusion of battle, but you may choose to return it before then simply by speaking to me.${prompt}
If you wish to undertake resistance operations, the resistance sapper will be pleased to assist.${prompt}
Our survival rests upon your cooperation. I beseech you to do your part.${prompt}

I've not seen your face 'round these parts before, stranger.
Another visitor from beyond the maw, perchance?${prompt}
You there!
I've a task for you, if you'd pray hear me out.${prompt}
I am Rahal S Lebrart, Commander of the Royal Knights of San d'Oria.
Or so I was, in the days when our proud kingdom still stood.${prompt}
...But I did not summon your attention to engage in nostalgic banter.
No, a more immediate matter demands our attention.${prompt}
To wit, I speak of a most savage pack of fiends that descends upon our convoys at will.
Raze our precious supplies and feast upon my men, they do, before vanishing with nary a trace.${prompt}
Rumor has it that from the twisted visage of one of these beasts sprouts a single jet-black whisker.
A whisker that--ask me not how--affords him and his entire pack foreknowledge of even our most artful strategems.
My men and I are nigh at wit's end.${prompt}
But perhaps a fresh pair of eyes would succeed where we have failed.
What say you, friend? Glean what knowledge you can of these creatures and that infernal whisker, and we would be much in your debt.${prompt}
Blast! Were it not for that accursed whisker, we'd make short work of these fiends!
At least, so the commander says...${prompt}
If you've a mind to venture inland, I suggest you take due caution.
The stories that our scouts tell would have even the most battle-hardened knight quaking in his sollerets.${prompt}
That...that whisker!
Could it truly be...!?${prompt}
Wherever...however did you find it?${prompt}
Claimed it off a fiend, you say?
Could it be...!?${prompt}
We have them! Goddess's mercy, we finally have them!
Prey on my men, would you!? Let us see how imposing you mangy lot are now, bereft of your almighty whisker!
Ahaha! Ahahahaaa...ah.${prompt}
Looking back upon it all, I must say I feel a mite sheepish.
To think that I, the former commander of the Royal Knights, would be struck dumb by a mere bristle of feline facial hair.${prompt}
What say we, ah, keep this matter between ourselves?
In return, you may consider the whisker yours, and this as well for your troubles!${prompt}
We move to put an end to the fiends' reign of terror once and for all!
Yes...as soon as I've, ah, formulated a suitable plan of attack.${prompt}
(Just between you and I, somehow Commander Rahal just doesn't inspire the confidence he once did.
Fighting off the hordes has taken its toll on even the most stout-hearted of us, I fear...)${prompt}
Ho there, traveller! I am compiling data on the effects of the horde's incursion on the water sources here in the inlet.
Have you ever taken a moment to reflect upon this vital environmental issue?${prompt}
Considered the water?
${selection-lines}
Why, only all the time!
Er...not really.
Have we met before?${prompt}
A ${choice-player-gender}[man/woman] after my own heart!
For without water, there is no life. Is it not so?${prompt}
However, I fear that the waters of this inlet, once so pure and pristine, grow more foul and stagnant by the hour.${prompt}
You cannot be serious!
So you have not observed that the once-pristine waters of this inlet grow more foul and stagnant by the hour?${prompt}
Have we met before? In Bastok, you say?
Why, no, I do not believe so.${prompt}
But it matters not. We have a crisis on our hands here!
Why, the once-pristine water of this inlet grows more foul and stagnant by the hour.${prompt}
It would not be an overstatement to say that if the situation is left unchecked, we will soon lack for the very means to sustain ourselves.${prompt}
Many a sleepless night and day--not that one can tell them apart in this bloody darkness--have I spent pondering this matter.
And yet a workable solution evades me.${prompt}
Why, just look!
Even the verdant flora cries out for our aid, as it begins to wither and wilt before our very eyes!${prompt}
Confound it! Whatever shall...we...${prompt}
...do...?${prompt}
The flora...of course!
How could I have been so blind?${prompt}
I've got it! Great Kaiser's ghost, High Bear has got it!${prompt}
...Ahem. Forgive me.
I am wont to get a bit...passionate...about my research.${prompt}
If it would not be too much trouble, I would ask for your aid.${prompt}
I need you to procure a few choice samples of the plants in this area.
A thorough study of them will surely turn up the answers I seek.${prompt}
How so, you say? Oh ho!
Always good to see a ${choice-player-gender}[man/woman] with a healthy dose of scientific curiosity.
Allow me to explain.${prompt}
Like us, plants absorb water in great quantities.
